thread.title: Criss Angel Cancels Appearances After Son's Cancer Diagnosis
thread.title_full: Criss Angel Cancels Appearances After Son's Cancer Diagnosis

title: Criss Angel Cancels Appearances After Son's Cancer Diagnosis
text: Criss Angel Cancels Appearances After Son's Cancer Diagnosis Sunday, 25 October 2015 (34 minutes ago) Criss Angel has cancelled his upcoming performances in light of the news that his one-year-old son Johnny is battling cancer. The 47-year-old magician cancelled all his shows until November 1st in order to be with his young son in Austalia, who was diagnosed with acute lymphoblastic leukemia. PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Criss [...] The 47 year old magician flew to Australia to support his young son diagnosed with leukemia.
